title: Oh! My Boss! Love is a Bonus Book
overview: Suzuki Nami was born and raised in a small rural town. As an ordinary woman, she wants to be happy. Nami decides to follow Kenya, who is her childhood friend and unrequited love, and applies for a job in the supply management department of a major publishing company in Tokyo. We are hired by the company, but it is sent to work in the editorial office of a fashion magazine. There, Nami works with the editor-in-chief of Reiko. She is a diabolical boss who makes hateful remarks and has a cool temper. Reiko mistreats Us because of his lack of seriousness in the work. But while Nami is watching the boss, she gradually begins to change her attitude.
